thread.title: The Meeting Show Closes. The Venue Expo prepares to Open
thread.title_full: The Meeting Show Closes. The Venue Expo prepares to Open

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: The Meeting Show Closes. The Venue Expo prepares to Open
text:
The Meeting Show Closes. The Venue Expo prepares to Open The Meeting Show Closes. The Venue Expo prepares to Open Details Created on Friday, 10 July 2015 10:45 The Venue Expo 2015 is the next big event on the MICE industry calendar. After a successful first year The Venue Expo 2015 returns with a brand new location and venue. Exhibition Centre Liverpool will host the only MICE Industry Exhibition in the North attracting Venues, Destinations & Event Support Services. 
The Venue Expo will be one of the first high profile exhibitions to take place at Exhibition Centre Liverpool, the new addition to ACC Liverpool. The new floor plan is over double the size of last year’s space allowing for more networking opportunities than ever before. Being the largest events based expo in the North of England, The Venue Expo is set to connect the events industry with a vast array of venues, destinations and event services with an aim to provide outstanding business opportunities for both exhibitors and buyers. With a vast array of high profile exhibitors already on board the event will be bigger and better than ever before. Some exhibitors include Visit Brighton, Concept Furniture, Hilton Worldwide and the newly announced Wembley Stadium – one of the largest stadiums in the UK. You will also have the opportunity to gain valuable knowledge through the seminars and speakers available. Our current timetable is led by high profile speakers providing invaluable talks which are CPD accredited, allowing you to broaden your professional development. The Venue Expo is a free to attend event and the only available one of its type in the North of England. To register for the event simply visit the thevenueexpo.co.uk Related articles
